title: More items for manaless Champs
body:
I really think that there's a lack of variety and efficiency when it comes to the items of non-mana using champs, AP in particular, since most AD items won't give any mana so all AD champs get the full bonus and aren't limited in their item builds. They benefit from almost everything.

AP non-mana Champs however are. You can't really switch between builds, because almost all good AP items (dmg and utility) have mana or something to do with mana. So it's not worth buying Morellonomicon on Akali for example, although the items offers some good utility and stats, but Akali along with others doesn't profit buying these items.

My suggestion would be to add new items specifiacally for such champs - to add more variety when it comes to building and utility as well. Adding some counter items to already existing mana heavy/benefiting ones so that these champs also get something.
